result.markdown:
---
title: "Moving my website to github"
author: "Ingmar Visser"
date: "2025-03-17"
categories: [news, code]
image: "image.jpg"
---


After using Wordpress for the longest time I decided it was time to move my website to quarto & github with the main advantage that it will be much easier to include R code on webpages and in blog posts such as below. Moreover, integration with github will make maintenance much easier. If you want to have a go, I mostly followed these sites when setting up:

-   <https://quarto.org/docs/websites/>

-   <https://samanthacsik.github.io/posts/2022-10-24-quarto-blogs/>


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
1 + 1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 2
```
:::
:::
